value.title: Avoid Parameter Error when refreshing a Power BI partition
value.excerpt: Ever run into a Parameter error when trying to refresh a partition in Power BI? It can drive you BANANAS! Patrick explains how to get around it and refresh successfully.   üì¢ Become a member: https://guyinacu.be/membership   *******************  Want to take your Power BI skills to the next level?

value.title: Can I use the audit log if I'm a Power BI Admin?
value.excerpt: In this video, I answer a question I get fairly often. Can I use the audit log if I have the Power BI service administrator role assigned to me within Office 365. value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
